name: LanderZ | Idle Post Apocalyptic
description:
Welcome to LANDERZ

LanderZ is an idle game, where you try to survive on earth after a disaster. 

  • Upgrade your character
  • Kill Bosses
  • Travel between zones

This is my first game released on the internet. Please consider you can experience some bugs and issues ! I'm alone and I'm 17, so if you want to support the project, join my discord and share your progress!

https://discord.gg/v5A3g2xYse
